medium: Etching and aquatint in dark brown ink
title: It's just my rough habits, I guess
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop bottom center, in pencil: [David Rathman 2002]; to
description: cowboy at L with a rifle under his arm, standing at the feet of a fallen figure; horse and building at R; mountains in background
